| Overview             = 
[[File:Inhuman_Torches_(Earth-616)_From_Thunderbolts_Vol_1_164.jpg|250px|left|thumb|"Inhuman Torches" attacking Captain America]]
The '''Inhuman Torches''' are [[Synthezoids]] with flame like powers. They were created by a Nazi scientist [[Heinrich Zemo (Earth-616)|Baron Heinrich Zemo]] from the designs of [[Phineas Horton (Earth-616)|Professor Phineas Horton]]. They contain [[Horton Cells]] that give them pyrokinetic powers identical to his original invention the [[Jim Hammond (Earth-616)|Human Torch (Jim Hammond)]].{{r|Thunderbolts Vol 1 164}}
| HistoryText             = 
The Thunderbolts who were travelling through time ended up in [[World War II]]. They teamed up with the Invaders on a mission to rescue the Human Torch. He was captured by Baron Zemo and dissected to learn the source of his powers. He used his artificial DNA to create his own army of Torches. He sent a squad to attack the Invaders.{{r|Thunderbolts Vol 1 164}} The Thunderbolts helped defeat the creatures by trapping them under a snowfall and tearing them apart. They then went and rescued the Torch and destroyed Zemo's lab.{{r|Thunderbolts Vol 1 165}}
